general.description: Lets you create emojis for your Discord server in just one step 🖼️
general.examples:
|- addemoji www.seite.de/bild.png cooler_emoji » adds the image with the name cooler_emoji
|- addemoji <:SadChaton:934265471103025162> » adds the emoji with its original name

errors.urlButNoName: {emotes.error} When adding an emoji via a URL, you must provide a name
errors.invalidUrl: {emotes.error} You must provide a valid URL to an image
errors.length: {emotes.error} The name must be between 2 and 32 characters
errors.cantCreate:
{emotes.error} I couldn't add the emoji - here are possible reasons why:
```|- the server doesn't have enough free slots left
|- the specified URL leads to no image
|- the specified emoji is no longer available
|- you have not specified a valid URL or emoji
|- the emoji exceeds Discord``` maximum size
{emotes.arrow} Can you rule out all the above reasons? Try again
{emotes.arrow} You think the problem isn't yours? Contact our [support server]({support})
